paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

functional_data.summary: The p.Val41Met variant is associated with familial amyloidotic polyneuropathy.

variants.additional_notes: The variant is the most common mutation in ATTRv-CM.
key_quotes: The most common mutation in ATTRv-CM is V122I, present in African Americans at a prevalence of 3.4%.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data was primarily from the main text, with no tables containing variant information.
